UPDATE so_package_temp
so_child_id = #{soChildId},
good_receiver_name = #{goodReceiverName},
good_receiver_mobile = #{goodReceiverMobile},
pro_city_area = #{proCityArea},
good_receiver_address = #{goodReceiverAddress},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate},
delivery_name = #{deliveryName},
delivery_name_mobile = #{deliveryNameMobile},
sign_name = #{signName},
sign_date = #{signDate},
sign_remark = #{signRemark},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
